panels.description: Max total time is taken for the node to sync. If the node synced for more than a week ago this value will be equal to 0.
panels.title: Sync Time

panels.description: Max total time is taken for the node to complete a pruning process. If the node finished pruning more than a week ago this value will be equal to 0.
panels.title: Pruning Time

panels.description: Ratio of 1559-type transactions in the block.
panels.title: 1559-type transactions ratio

panels.description: Total number of failed block seals
panels.title: Failed Block Seals (total)

panels.description: Indicator if blocks can be produced
panels.title: Blocks Production Indicator

panels.description: Number of reported malicious misbehaviour validators
panels.title: Reported Malicious Misbehaviour

panels.description: Number of sealed transactions generated by engine
panels.title: Sealed Transactions

panels.description: Number of reported benign misbehaviour validators
panels.title: Reported Benign Misbehaviour

panels.description: RANDAO number of reveal number transactions
panels.title: RANDAO Reveal Number

panels.description: POSDAO number of emit init change transactions
panels.title: POSDAO Emit Initiate Change

panels.description: RANDAO number of commit hash transactions
panels.title: RANDAO Commit Hash Transaction
